translation:
To be seen by the great — Antônio Casas

Most Illustrious Sir

Herewith I send to Your Excellency, Most Illustrious Sir Dom Antônio Casas, the sum of 945 pesos, which are paid, as appears from the receipt issued for said order; which I beg Your Lordship Tribunal of the Treasury to please order to be paid to me by the Collection Office of this town, as appropriate.

God keep Your Lordship  
Bagé, February 9, 1839.  
Joaquim Pereira Fagundes

To citizen Serafim dos Anjos França, General Inspector of the National Public Treasury.
